dcterms:creator: S. Koelstra
C. Muhl
M. Soleymani
J.S. Lee
A. Yazdani
T. Ebrahimi
T. Pun
A. Nijholt
I. Patras
dcterms:description: The DEAP dataset is a multimodal dataset where thirty-two healthy subjects watched 40 one-minute pieces of music videos while their EEG and peripheral physiological signals were recorded. Participants rated each video on four emotional dimensions: arousal, valence, dominance, and liking.
dcterms:title: DEAP

dcterms:creator: S. Katsigiannis
N. Ramzan
dcterms:description: The DREAMER dataset consists of EEG recordings from twenty-three subjects while they watched 18 emotional film clips. Subjects rated their emotional responses on arousal, valence, and dominance after each clip.
dcterms:title: DREAMER
